name: The Freeroam Game!
description:
V1.2 Update!

1 New Map!(Dog Park)

Youtube and Discord buttons added!

-------------------------------------

A Beta Freeroam game!

One map at the moment (Small NYC).

--------------------------------------

The controls are listed below:

WASD - Movement Controls

L Shift - Crouch

J - Main Menu

R - Reset Player

(L to get rid of Tutorial Text)

--------------------------------------

This is my FIRST ever Unity game that I have uploaded! I hope you enjoy <3

(Let me know if there are any features you want me to add!)

--------------------------------------
